channel.title: Webrtc on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Webrtc on Arrans github.io

item.title: m1k1o/neko
item.description: A self hosted virtual browser that runs in docker and uses WebRTC.

item.title: AlexxIT/go2rtc
item.description: Ultimate camera streaming application with support RTSP, RTMP, HTTP-FLV, WebRTC, MSE, HLS, MP4, MJPEG, HomeKit, FFmpeg, etc.

item.title: kern/filepizza
item.description: 🍕 Peer-to-peer file transfers in your browser

item.title: bluenviron/mediamtx
item.description: Ready-to-use SRT / WebRTC / RTSP / RTMP / LL-HLS / MPEG-TS / RTP media server and media proxy that allows to read, publish, proxy, record and playback video and audio streams.

item.title: polius/FileSync
item.description: Send files from one device to many in real-time.

item.title: tinode/chat
item.description: Instant messaging platform. Backend in Go. Clients: Swift iOS, Java Android, JS webapp, scriptable command line; chatbots
